category.name: Product Structure.CAD BOM Alignment
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSM_enable_PLMXML_Assembly
preference.preference_description: Controls the generation of PLMXML assembly file, when design assembly published with shape option in the Multi Structure Manager and MPP application. The default value is true which will enable the PLMXML assembly generation and attach it to Part revision with rendering relation.
